scripts.cron:reminders:once: sh -c 'if [ -f ./.env.local ]; then set -a; . ./.env.local; set +a; fi; test -n "$CRON_SECRET" || { echo "Set CRON_SECRET in .env.local or environment"; exit 1; }; curl --fail --show-error --silent -X POST -H "Authorization: Bearer $CRON_SECRET" "${CRON_URL:-http://localhost:3000/api/cron/class-reminders}"'
scripts.cron:reminders:loop: sh -c 'if [ -f ./.env.local ]; then set -a; . ./.env.local; set +a; fi; while true; do date; npm run -s cron:reminders:once; echo; sleep 300; done'
